mapper.select: SELECT a.accommodation_id, a.name, a.host_id, COUNT(p.payment_id) AS total_booking FROM payments p LEFT JOIN accommodations a ON p.accommodation_id = a.accommodation_id WHERE DATE_FORMAT(p.create_day, '%Y-%m') = DATE_FORMAT(CURDATE(), '%Y-%m') AND a.host_id = #{hostId} GROUP BY a.accommodation_id, a.name, a.host_id ORDER BY total_booking DESC LIMIT 5;
